text: The National symbols of the Serene Republic of San Marino are the symbols that are used to represent both the divided Sammarinese people proper and abroad to represent the country and its people. ==Symbols== Symbol Image Coat of arms Coat of arms of San Marino Flag Flag of San Marino Flower National flower of San Marino Cyclamen purpurascens Plant National plant of San Marino Ruscus hypoglossum Tree National tree of San Marino Ostrya carpinifolia Bird National bird of San Marino Falco peregrinus peregrinus Animal National animal of San Marino Bardigiano
title: National symbols of San Marino
